info.title: Basketball - NBA
info.description: The API calls below can be used to test the Input and Output of our API endpoints.  You'll need an API key and an assigned secret to access the live data and so if you haven't contacted us yet, now is the time!  Our sales staff would be happy to set you up with trial access so you can begin to evaluate the product. NBA - National Basketball Association

get.summary: The teams endpoint will be your source for team na...
get.description: The teams endpoint will be your source for team names, locations, abbreviations, and IDs.  You can get information about a single team by including the teamId.  If you do not include a teamId, you will get all the teams for the league

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return information for one team.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description:
Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, and shot charts.  The box, pbp, & shotCharts parameters are only available when a single game is selected.
 Simple schedules are also available via the events endpoint.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and shotChart parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: shotCharts
parameters.description:
Returns the shot charts for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'shotCharts=true'.
  Default - shot chart data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description: Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, and shot charts.  However box scores, play-by-play, and shot charts are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return information for one team.

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and bo...
get.description: The box/ resource provides scores/schedules and box score information for NBA events.  (Play-by-play & Shot Charts are not available in the box endpoint.)

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and shotChart parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

However, box scores are available for a single game only, and so cannot be accessed here when all events for a single team are returned. This endpoint should be used for team schedules & scores only.

get.summary: The standings endpoint will provide the league sta...
get.description: The standings endpoint will provide the league standings, including all team data relevant to standings.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description:
Expanded includes additional data points for each team.
 Default - false

parameters.name: conference
parameters.description:
Conference returns teams ranked by conference instead of division.
 Default - false

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.description: This will return anyone who has played since the beginning of the entered year (season).

parameters.name: sinceYearLast
parameters.description:
Anyone who last played since the requested year.  Enter year as YYYY.
  Default - current rosters

Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

  Default - json

get.summary: Historical rosters provide biographical informatio...
get.description: Historical rosters provide biographical information for players that played for a team in a single specified season.

parameters.name: teamId

get.summary: The participants endpoint provides biographical in...
get.description: The participants endpoint provides biographical information for players and can be used to return information on a single player, a single teams roster, all teams rosters within the league, or all free agents.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: freeAgent
parameters.description:
Indicates whether Free Agents should be included in participants list.
  Default - no free agents will be returned in the results.

parameters.name: freeAgentSinceYear
parameters.description:
Applicable only if you have also requested to have Free Agents returned in the results.  Enter year as YYYY.
  Default - all current free agents

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NBA - Season stats for a single player

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: enc
parameters.description:
The encyclopedia returns full career and season-by-season totals.
 Notes:
  The encyclopedia is valid for a single player only.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: careerOnly
parameters.description: For a single player's career stats, only to be used in conjunction with 'enc=true'

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NBA - Player splits (breakdowns).

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
  Default - Official totals (splitId = -1)

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: healed

get.summary: NBA - Player Injuries

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
If used, startDate and endDate must both be entered.  All items between the two dates (inclusive) will be returned.
  Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - If not used, the last 7 days items will be returned.

  Default - json

get.summary: By default, results include all injuries for a pla...
get.description:
By default, results include all injuries for a player (a) during the time period selected, (b) if the injury has not healed and (c) for all the teams the player was on during the time period.
 To return only those injuries while a player is on a specific team, you must include /teams/:teamId in the URI.

get.summary: NBA - Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Minutes).

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: nonQualifiers
parameters.description:
Should non-qualifiers be returned?
  Default - false

parameters.name: sortType
parameters.description:
To return 'worst' players (trailers) rather than 'best' players (leaders) in a category, select sortType = worst. Traliers are not available for every leaderCategoryId.
  Default - If the sortType parameter is not used, leaders will be returned.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NBA - Daily Leaders

parameters.name: leaderCategoryId
parameters.description:
Only one category per query.  The decodes resource provides a list of available codes. 
  Default - Blank (returns Minutes).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: topCount
parameters.description:
This is the number of leaders to be returned.
  You can return all leaders with the word 'all' instead of a number.
  Default - Top 10 (plus ties), utilizing ranked players only if nonQualifiers is false/null; else will utilize ordered players.

parameters.name: conferenceId
parameters.description:
Leaders among specified conference only.
  Default - all NBA

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only relevant when eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason) is selected
  Default - all rounds

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: Provide team ID to return information for one team.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: roundNumber
parameters.description:
Return draft picks for a specifc round only.
  Default - all rounds

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NBA - Matchup Gaming for a single day

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Will return all games from a specific date.
 Format: YYYYMMDD or YYYY-MM-DD.
  Default - if a specific game isn't requested, all games from the current date will be returned

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NBA - Single Game

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and shotChart parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: NBA - Fantasy projections for the required event

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and shotChart parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this events endpoint will provide you wi...
get.description: Access to this events endpoint will provide you with the highest level of optical game data including live scores, box scores, play-by-play, shot/pass/touch/possession breakdowns, and more. An eventId is always required for optical event endpoints.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and shotChart parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: box
parameters.description:
Returns the box score for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'box=true'.
  Default - box score data will not be returned

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: linescore
parameters.description:
Linescores are only returned when requested and will be returned for all events in the results.
  Default - false, line score data will not be returned

parameters.name: matchupStats
parameters.description:
Returns matchup details (offensive stats and defensive results against opposing players), broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default false, matchup stats will not be returned

parameters.name: pbp
parameters.description:
Returns the play-by-play for a specific in-progress or concluded event.  An eventId must also be entered in conjunction with 'pbp=true'.
  Default - pbp data will not be returned

parameters.name: passBreakdown
parameters.description:
Returns passing statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, pass breakdown stats will not be returned

parameters.name: possessionBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Provides statistics on different aspects of a team's possessions. More in-depth than 'possessions'. 
  Default - Unused, no possession breakdown data will be returned

parameters.name: possessions
parameters.description:
Enumerates the possessions for the given event and also provides specific stats related to the possession.
  Default - false, possession data will not be returned

parameters.name: reboundLog
parameters.description:
Returns rebound enumeration and statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, rebound statistics will not be returned

parameters.name: screenStats
parameters.description:
Returns pick-and-roll (pnr) stats, broken down by both players and teams, for the given event. 
  Default - false, pick-and-roll statistics will not be returned

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description:
Provides player coordinate location data (X,Y,Z) based on PBP sequence time. 
  Default - false, coordinate data for PBP sequences will not be returned

parameters.name: shotBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Provides statistics on different aspects of a team's player's shots. More in-depth than 'shotLog'. 
  Default - Unused, no shot breakdown data will be returned

parameters.name: shotLog
parameters.description:
Returns shot enumeration and statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, shot statistics will not be returned

parameters.name: statCoordinateTypeId
parameters.description:
Returns comma-delimited stat coordinate strings, broken down by player, describing where a particular stat occurred. 
  Default - Unused, stat coordinate data will not be returned

parameters.name: touchBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Returns various touch-related statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - Unused, no touch breakdown statistics will be returned

parameters.name: touchStatTypeId
parameters.description:
Provides shot result statistics based on different touch locations in the offensive zone, broken down by both players and teams, for the given event. 
  Default - Unused, no shot result touch location data will be returned

get.summary: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you wit...
get.description: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you with the highest level of optical player stats data including distance run, average speed, touches, passes, assists, rebounds, and fouls. A playerId is always required when requesting this endpoint.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
To get team lists for a different season, enter the year as YYYY.
 Note: Seasons that span years like NBA 2013-2014 would be entered as 2013.
  Default - the current season

parameters.name: statsFrom
parameters.description:
This parameter allows you to further breakdown optical player stats by season totals (FULL), season totals by all team stints (ALL), and season totals for one or more stints on the same team (TEAM). Please note: the statsFrom=TEAM value also requires you to supply the 'teamId' parameter with a value. 
  Default - FULL, season totals will be returned.

parameters.name: defenseStats
parameters.description:
Returns analytic information for a player regarding times when they were defending another player. 
  Default - false, defense stats will not be returned.

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: matchupStats
parameters.description:
Returns matchup details (offensive stats and defensive results against opposing players), broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default false, matchup stats will not be returned

parameters.name: passBreakdown
parameters.description:
Returns passing statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, pass breakdown stats will not be returned

parameters.name: shotBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Provides statistics on different aspects of a team's player's shots. More in-depth than 'shotLog'. 
  Default - Unused, no shot breakdown data will be returned

parameters.name: touchBreakdownId
parameters.description:
Returns various touch-related statistics, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - Unused, no touch breakdown statistics will be returned

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json

get.summary: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you wit...
get.description: Access to this stats endpoint will provide you with the highest level of optical player stats data for a single player from a specific event including distance run, average speed, touches, passes, assists, rebounds, and fouls. A playerId is always required when requesting this endpoint.

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: To get information on a specific player, enter their ID.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description:
Provide a specific eventID when you want information on a single game.  Must be populated to use the box, pbp, and shotChart parameters.
 Default - basic score data will be returned using date or season, if entered, else the current days events will be returned

parameters.name: eventRoundId
parameters.description:
Leaders among games in the specified eventRound only. Rounds are only relevant when eventTypeId = 2 (Postseason) is selected
  Default - all rounds

parameters.name: eventTypeId
parameters.description:
Schedule will be returned for games included in the specified eventType.
  Default - All event types

parameters.name: splitId
parameters.description:
Enter the stat split to be returned. (The decodes resource provides a list of available codes.)
  1. If omitted, only official total stats (splitId = -1) will be returned.
  2. If 'all', all the splits are returned.
  3. Otherwise, the entered split is returned.
  Default - Official totals (splitId = -1)

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description:
To get data for players on one team only, enter the teamId.
  Default - all players

parameters.name: fitness
parameters.description:
Returns fitness analytic information, broken down by player, for the given event. 
  Default - false, fitness data will not be returned

parameters.name: languageId
parameters.description:
Select ID to change language of team & venue names. Not all languages available for every name.
  Default - English is returned when no ID is selected.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description:
Preferred response type.
  Default - json
